short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Follow Fire allows you to automatically follow Instagram accounts, in return gaining you new followers faster than ever!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Register at https://followfire.io/register
2. Purchase a subscription
3. Download Follow Fire Chrome Extension
4. Sign in to Follow Fire Chrome Extension
5. Open any Instagram account and use the Follow Fire Chrome Extension to follow accounts
